Mr Eric Schmidt , speaking at the DLD media conference in Munich yesterday, said he expected to spend another 10 years at the company, after his surprise handover last week to co-founder Larry Page. I'm very personally excited about my next decade at Google, said Mr Eric Schmidt , who had previously said that the move was an effort to speed up decision-making. talkback No responses currently. soon. Finally, Steve Ballmer spoke briefly of Microsoft's recently announced partnership with Nokia. He once again brought Nokia's chief executive Stephen Elop up on stage, who said that Nokia would support Windows to build strength versus the other mobile platforms . The first Nokia device running Windows Phone is expected later this year.
